settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and application settings.
settings.profile_description: Manage your profile and application settings.
settings.password_description: Be sure to use a strong password to protect your account.
settings.delete_account_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
settings.delete_confirmation_description: This action cannot be undone and you will lose all your data. Please write your password before proceeding.
settings.delete_account_warning: Once you delete your account, you will lose all your data and you won't be able to recover it. Please write your password before proceeding.
settings.appearance_description: Customize the appearance of the application.
settings.language_description: Change the language of the application.
